name: Rust Carbon
author: mike@mikehawke.co.uk
description: The only aim in Rust is to survive. To do this you will need to overcome struggles such as hunger, thirst and cold. Build a fire. Build a shelter. Kill animals for meat. Protect yourself from other players, and kill them for meat. Create alliances with other players and form a town. Do whatever it takes to survive.

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
# steamcmd Base Installation Script
#
# Server Files: /mnt/server

SRCDS_APPID=258550

## just in case someone removed the defaults.
if [ "${STEAM_USER}" == "" ]; then
    echo -e "steam user is not set.\n"
    echo -e "Using anonymous user.\n"
    STEAM_USER=anonymous
    STEAM_PASS=""
    STEAM_AUTH=""
else
    echo -e "user set to ${STEAM_USER}"
fi

## download and install steamcmd
cd /tmp
mkdir -p /mnt/server/steamcmd
curl -sSL -o steamcmd.tar.gz https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/client/installer/steamcmd_linux.tar.gz
tar -xzvf steamcmd.tar.gz -C /mnt/server/steamcmd
mkdir -p /mnt/server/steamapps # Fix steamcmd disk write error when this folder is missing
cd /mnt/server/steamcmd

# SteamCMD fails otherwise for some reason, even running as root.
# This is changed at the end of the install process anyways.
chown -R root:root /mnt
export HOME=/mnt/server

## install game using steamcmd
./steamcmd.sh +force_install_dir /mnt/server +login ${STEAM_USER} ${STEAM_PASS} ${STEAM_AUTH} +app_update ${SRCDS_APPID} ${EXTRA_FLAGS} validate +quit ## other flags may be needed depending on install. looking at you cs 1.6

## set up 32 bit libraries
mkdir -p /mnt/server/.steam/sdk32
cp -v linux32/steamclient.so ../.steam/sdk32/steamclient.so

## set up 64 bit libraries
mkdir -p /mnt/server/.steam/sdk64
cp -v linux64/steamclient.so ../.steam/sdk64/steamclient.so

variables.name: Server Name
variables.description: The name of your server in the public server list.

variables.name: Carbon
variables.description: Set whether you want the server to Just use the installed version of Carbon, auto update Carbon or run Vanilla Rust.

variables.name: Carbon Build
variables.description: Set the Carbon Build that you want running on your server

variables.name: Minimal
variables.description: Install the Minimal version. Valid options are "1" for true and "0" for false.

variables.name: Update
variables.description: Set whether you want the server to use and auto update Rust or not. Valid options are "1" for true and "0" for false.

variables.name: Level
variables.description: The world file for Rust to use.

variables.name: Description
variables.description: The description under your server title. Commonly used for rules & info. Use \n for newlines.

variables.name: URL
variables.description: The URL for your server. This is what comes up when clicking the "Visit Website" button.

variables.name: World Size
variables.description: The world size for a procedural map.

variables.name: World Seed
variables.description: The seed for a procedural map.

variables.name: Max Players
variables.description: The maximum amount of players allowed in the server at once.

variables.name: Server Image
variables.description: The header image for the top of your server listing.

variables.name: RCON Port
variables.description: Port for RCON connections.

variables.name: Query Port
variables.description: Port used for server Query (Need to be separate from gameport).

variables.name: RCON Password
variables.description: RCON access password.

variables.name: Save Interval
variables.description: Sets the server’s auto-save interval in seconds.

variables.name: Additional Arguments
variables.description: Add additional startup parameters to the server.

variables.name: App Port
variables.description: Port for the Rust+ App. -1 to disable.

variables.name: Server Logo
variables.description: The circular server logo for the Rust+ app.

variables.name: Custom Map URL
variables.description: Overwrites the map with the one from the direct download URL. Invalid URLs will cause the server to crash.

variables.name: Gamemode
variables.description: Sets the servers gamemode.

variables.name: Server Tags
variables.description: A list of all server tags available can be found here: https://wiki.facepunch.com/rust/server-browser-tags

variables.name: Rust+ Public IP
variables.description: This should be set to the public IP address of the node.

variables.name: Carbon Root Directory
variables.description: Change Carbons Root Directory

variables.name: Server Identity
variables.description: Server Identity

variables.name: LogFile
variables.description: Save a logfile? Logs will be located in your /home/container/logs folder, Valid options are "1" for true and "0" for false.
